title: Homemade Spicy Taco Seasoning
directions: Combine all spices in a bowl. Stir to combine.

Brown ground beef in a skillet over high heat. Drain the excess fat from the pan. Reduce heat to medium. Stir in spice mix and water. [You can add more if you like your tacos extra saucy, but 1 cup should do!] Simmer approximately 5 minutes until the beef is flavorful and the spices are well combined.
